item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“What do you mean by quoting this proverb concerning the land of Israel:

“‘The fathers eat sour grapes,

And the children’s teeth become numb?’
“As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, you will not quote this proverb in Israel anymore!
Indeed! All lives are mine—the life of the father as well as the life of the son is mine. The one who sins will die.
“Suppose a man is righteous. He practices what is just and right;

does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> pagan sacrifices <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05869 05375">pray</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st><n id="2" /> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>; does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>; does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0413 07126">approach</st> a <st data-num="0802" class="">woman</st> <st data-num="07126" class="">for marital relations</st><n id="3" /> during her <st data-num="05079" class="">period</st>;

does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03238" class="">oppress</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">anyone</st>, but <st data-num="07725" class="">gives</st> the <st data-num="02326" class="">debtor</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> <st data-num="02258" class="">whatever was given in pledge</st>;<n id="1" /> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01497" class="">commit</st> <st data-num="01500" class="">robbery</st>,<n id="2" /> but <st data-num="05414" class="">gives</st> his <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> to the <st data-num="07457" class="">hungry</st> and <st data-num="03680 0899">clothes</st> the <st data-num="05903" class="">naked</st>;

does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05414" class="">engage</st> in <st data-num="05392" class="">usury</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">charge</st> <st data-num="08636" class="">interest</st>,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="07725 03027">refrains</st><n id="2" /> from <st data-num="05766" class="">wrongdoing</st>; <st data-num="06213" class="">promotes</st> <st data-num="0571" class="">true</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">justice</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> <st data-num="0376 0376">men</st>;
and follows my statutes and observes my regulations by carrying them out. That man is righteous; he will certainly live, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“Suppose such a man has a violent son who sheds blood and does any of these things mentioned previously

(though <st data-num="01931" class="">the father</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">do</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">them</st>).<n id="1" /> He <st data-num="03588 01571 0398">eats</st> pagan sacrifices <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="02930" class="">defiles</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,

<st data-num="03238" class="">oppresses</st> the <st data-num="06041" class="">poor</st> and the <st data-num="034" class="">needy</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01497" class="">commits</st> <st data-num="01500" class="">robbery</st>, does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">give back</st> <st data-num="02258" class="">what was given in pledge</st>, <st data-num="05375 05869">prays</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>, <st data-num="06213" class="">performs</st> <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable acts</st>,
engages in usury, and charges interest. Will he live? He will not! Because he has done all these abominable deeds he will certainly die. He will bear the responsibility for his own death.
“But suppose he in turn has a son who notices all the sins his father commits, considers them, and does not follow his father’s example.

He does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> pagan sacrifices <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st>, does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="05869 05375">pray</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02930" class="">defile</st> his <st data-num="07453" class="">neighbor’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>,

does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03238" class="">oppress</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="02254" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="02258" class="">what has been given in pledge</st>, does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01497" class="">commit</st> <st data-num="01500" class="">robbery</st>, <st data-num="05414" class="">gives</st> his <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> to the <st data-num="07457" class="">hungry</st> and <st data-num="03680 0899">clothes</st> the <st data-num="05903" class="">naked</st>,

<st data-num="07725 03027">refrains</st> from <st data-num="05766" class="">wrongdoing</st>,<n id="1" /> does <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">engage in</st> <st data-num="05392" class="">usury</st> or charge <st data-num="08636" class="">interest</st>, <st data-num="06213" class="">carries out</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st>, and <st data-num="01980" class="">follows</st> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> for his <st data-num="01" class="">father’s</st> <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>;<n id="2" /> he will <st data-num="02421" class="">surely</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>.
As for his father, because he practices extortion, robs his brother, and does what is not good among his people, he will die for his iniquity.
“Yet you say, ‘Why should the son not suffer for his father’s iniquity?’ When the son does what is just and right, and observes all my statutes and carries them out, he will surely live.

The person who sins is the one who will die. A son will not suffer for his father’s iniquity, and a father will not suffer for his son’s iniquity; the righteous person will be judged according to his righteousness and the wicked person according to his wickedness.
“But if the wicked person turns from all the sin he has committed and observes all my statutes and does what is just and right, he will surely live; he will not die.

<st data-num="03605 03808">None</st> of the <st data-num="06588 0834">sins</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> will be <st data-num="02142" class="">held</st><n id="1" /> against him; because of the <st data-num="06666 0834">righteousness</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st>, he will <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>.
Do I actually delight in the death of the wicked, declares the Sovereign Lord? Do I not prefer that he turn from his wicked conduct and live?

“But if a righteous man turns away from his righteousness and practices wrongdoing according to all the abominable practices the wicked carry out, will he live? All his righteous acts will not be remembered; because of the unfaithful acts he has done and the sin he has committed, he will die.
“Yet you say, ‘The Lord’s conduct is unjust!’ Hear, O house of Israel: Is my conduct unjust? Is it not your conduct that is unjust?

When a <st data-num="06662" class="">righteous person</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turns back</st> from his <st data-num="06666" class="">righteousness</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">practices</st> <st data-num="05766" class="">wrongdoing</st>, he will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> it;<n id="1" /> because of the <st data-num="05766 0834">wrongdoing</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st>, he will <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.

When a <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked person</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turns</st> from the <st data-num="07564 0834">wickedness</st> he has <st data-num="06213" class="">committed</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">does</st> <st data-num="04941 06666">what is</st> <st data-num="04941" class="">just</st> and <st data-num="06666" class="">right</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="02421" class="">preserve</st> his <st data-num="05315" class="">life</st>.

Because he <st data-num="07200" class="">considered</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="06588 0834">sins</st> he had <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st>, he will <st data-num="02421" class="">surely</st> <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>; he will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>.
Yet the house of Israel says, ‘The Lord’s conduct is unjust!’ Is my conduct unjust, O house of Israel? Is it not your conduct that is unjust?

“Therefore, I will judge each person according to his conduct, O house of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord. Repent and turn from all your wickedness; then it will not be an obstacle leading to iniquity.

<st data-num="07993 05921">Throw away</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="06588 0834">sins</st> you have <st data-num="06586" class="">committed</st> and <st data-num="06213" class="">fashion</st> yourselves a <st data-num="02319" class="">new</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">heart</st> and a <st data-num="02319" class="">new</st> <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04100" class="">Why</st> should you <st data-num="04191" class="">die</st>, O <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>?
For I take no delight in the death of anyone, declares the Sovereign Lord. Repent and live!
